file_content.text: Nothing like a cold glass of water on a Tatooine day.
Your vaporators are working now.
Thank you. I'll think of you next time I have a shower. Well, you know what I mean.
Just... water's our life here. And you've given it back to us.
And it looks like you've got the whole camp of those sand-rats on the run!
Now we'll have the strength to teach those sand-rats not to take on human beings!
We can't fix those vaporators, we might as well give up and move offworld.
Hope you're not planning on settling out here. These parts ain't too friendly to humans.
Well, to anyone who ain't one of those blasted Sand People.
We made sure to build on land the Sand People never used. Didn't matter. They're attacking us, our livestock, our vaporators. Anything they can do to drive us off.
Do you need protection?
Can I help?
Naw. We've built our homes well. We're safe enough inside.
Have you tried negotiating?
Deal? Those freaks are hardly more than herd animals. We're making good farms out of this wasteland!
There's plenty more useless desert up for grabs.
You should move.
You think we're gonna let some google-eyed desert freaks drive us out of our homes?
All we need is someone who can drive the beasts back long enough to repair our vaporators.
Long as we're getting fresh water, we can wait 'em out. Otherwise, dry season'll kill us off before the Sand People ever do.
Tell your people they are safe.
I will do this.
I could not call myself a Jedi if I let your people die over so simple a thing.
I will help your people.
Thank you, Master Jedi. I take back everything I ever said about your order.
You hold down the home front. I'll make sure you have the supplies you need.
I'll fix your vaporators.
I'll salute you for that, soldier.
There's a non-dry season?
Dry season?
Heh. That's Tatooine, all right. Does that mean you'll do us this favor?
What would it take?
I'll show you where we're trying to harvest the water from.
You just got to get past the Sand People camped around all our vaporators, wiggle the switch a few times and make sure they're working.
And if you cut down their numbers some, well, that'll just help us have a better chance in the next raid.
You'll manage. [Refuse quest]
I ain't looking for cheering up.
No use for foreigners in these parts.
